channel.title: Free city audioguide from iAudioguide.com for several cities
channel.description: Free samples of the many free multilingual audio guides from iAudioguide.com. We currently cover London, Paris, Barcelona, Rome and Brussels in English, French, Italian and German, and our parnter websites offer free quality audio guides for more cities in the world. There are separate podcasts for each city and each language. This is the podcast to inform you whenever a new city or a new language version is added. To stay informed on updates for specific cities, please subscribe to the city podcast in your language. The feeds/links you can find on our website.
channel.itunes:author: info@iaudioguide.com

image.title: Free city audio guides for in 4 languages for London, Rome, Paris, Barcelona and Brussels

item.title: Audio guide Rome - English sample
item.description: This is a sample of the free iAudioguide Rome, offering entertaining information on the highlights of Rome. The entire audiotour and a pdf map and a iPod map are available from our website at iAudioguide.com
item.author: info@iAudioguide.com
item.itunes:author: info@iaudioguide.com

item.title: Esempio della Audioguide Roma gratuita - Italiano
item.description: Questo e un esempio della iAudioguide Roma gratuita, che offre oltre 60 minuti di informazioni sui punti di maggior interesse di Roma. L'intero tour audio e una mappa sono disponibili sul nostro sito web iAudioguide.com

item.title: Audio guide Paris- Beispiel auf Deutsch
item.description: Dies ist einer der 12 Tracks des kostenlosen Audioguide Paris. Der Audioguide insgesamt dauert etwa eine Stunde und beschreibt auf informative und unterhaltsame Weise die wichtigsten Sehenswuerdigkeiten von Paris. Der gesamte Audioguide kann unter iAudioguide.com heruntergeladen werden, ebenso wie ein Stadtplan (pdf und iPod) mit den beschriebenen Sehenswuerdigkeiten.
item.author: info@iAudioguide.com
